subject: Heisman Trophy
Football
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Florida’s Tim Tebow, the first major college quarterback to reach 20 passing touchdowns and 20 rushing touchdowns in a season, became the first sophomore to win the Heisman Trophy.
snippet: Florida’s Tim Tebow, the first major college quarterback to reach 20 passing touchdowns and 20 rushing touchdowns in a season, became the first sophomore to win the Heisman Trophy.
